data.title: Portugal Stock (in Investing mode)
data.text:
Portugal have only 3 stocks in Trading 212 in CFD mode only. Is it possible to add more stock options from this country to invest and CFD´s also?

There is some of listed Portuguese stocks from EURONEXT Lisbon:

JERÓNIMO MARTINS (JMT.LS)

GALP ENERGIA (GALP.LS)

MOTA-ENGIL SGPS S.A. (EGL.LS)

SONAE SGPS S.A (SON.LS)

EDP (EDP.LS)

EDP RENOVÁVEIS (EDPR.LS)

NOS TELECOMUNICAÇÕES (NOS.LS)

GRUPO IMPRESA (IPR.LS)

COFINA S.A (CFN.LS)

CTT Correios de Portugal (CTT.LS)

BCP - Banco Comercial Português S.A. (BCP.LS)

They won’t be able to add them as it’s not a Penny Stock Exempt.

As a recommendation before posting, just go to https://www.otcmarkets.com/ put in your thicker and be sure it has the Penny Stock Exempt badge. Only they can be added.

Funny that you caught me out on that @Rygel…

I am aware of it, I even liked several of your posts today as I think you are doing a great job of increasing awareness and kindly replying to threads .

Unfortunately, I just assumed that as it was a profitable company and with a reasonable stock price it was automatically penny stock exempt. I did not even ocurr to me to check.

I am very surprised that it is not penny stock exempt as its share price is greater than 5 dollars and I am confident that its assets exceed 5 million USD.

Following on from my previous post, it seems like the ticker from Yahoo (which I mentioned above) is incorrect:

The correct ticker is EDRVF, which as expected is Penny Stock Exempt:

https://www.otcmarkets.com/stock/EDRVF/overview

Thanks for raising it Rygel, we have now hopefully got the apropriate ticker.
